## Media interface

Any type of media that exists at a URL.

Can be image, audio, or video.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface Media 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [type](./stentor-models.media.type.md) | [MediaType](./stentor-models.mediatype.md) | The type of media. |
|  [url](./stentor-models.media.url.md) | string | The location of the resource. |
